channel.title: CVE Feed for Control Web Panel -- Control Web Panel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Control Web Panel -- Control Web Panel

item.title: CVE-2023-42123|2024-05-03T02:13:29.824Z -- control%20web%20panel -- control%20web%20panel
item.description:
Control Web Panel mysql_manager Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Control Web Panel. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the mysql_manager module. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-21080.
